page.title: 13MY FAMILY
page.content: My Family is very important to me. When one of us is ill and has to go into hospital we all have to help each other and manage as best we can.We try to get along to help each other and we have lots of arguments so mum and dad sort us out.We try to keep mum calm so when she's watching her favourite T.V programme we all keep quiet so she's in peace.We go on holiday together. When we are on holiday I feel very happy because all the family is near me and everyone is happy.When my dad is away because of his work I feel that he has got lost and I worry about him.When he is home I feel very happy.When it's dinner time on a Sunday we sit down and eat our meal altogether and we have a good family talk.
